snippet: Gov. Rick Scott vetoed a bill that would have allowed some young immigrants who are living in the United States illegally to apply for a temporary driver’s license.
abstract: Gov Rick Scott of Florida vetoes bill that would have allowed some young immigrants living in United States illegally to apply for temporary driver's license.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Scott vetoed a bill that would have allowed some young immigrants who are living in the United States illegally to apply for a temporary driver’s license.
